detail_desc: Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave containing some wool with fringing along the short sides.

Single-breasted jacket in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and rounded, slightly longer back. One top has an all-over print.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Short kimono in soft viscose and cotton jersey with lace sections on the shoulders. Wide, short sleeves with lace trims, concealed ties at the waist and a detachable tie belt.
Blouse in a semi-transparent textured weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with flounced, asymmetric cuffs.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Legs with creases and covered elastication at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Wide blouse in an airy, viscose weave with a large, voluminous collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, long, wide sleeves with ties and a double flounce at the cuffs.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Biker boots in imitation leather with adjustable straps and metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in an airy viscose weave with buttons down the front, short sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a small imitation leather appliqué on the chest. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring, a kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with contrasting colour side stripes, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a wide asymmetric flounce. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Top in jersey with broderie anglaise. Short puff sleeves with elasticated flounced trims, and a flounce at the hem.

prod_name: HALO Glow in the dark gloves
detail_desc: Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a glow-in-the-dark print on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, functional, ribbed fabric made from recycled polyester with a racer back.
Fine-knit top with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long, ribbed sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on one sleeve and a gently rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, a knot at the front and a fastener at the back.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Bucket hat in woven fabric made from recycled cotton.
Loose-fitting yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and an opening and slit at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace underwired bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft,organic cotton jersey leggings in different designs with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
V-neck nursing top in soft viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Fully lined lace bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
Top in waffled jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Temporary tattoos in various designs and sizes.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves. Raw, roll edges around the neckline and cuffs, and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking at the top, long sleeves and elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Peep-toed platform ankle boots in imitation suede with a cut-out section, an ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle, and a zip in one side. Covered heels and platform, and imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 1 cm, heel 11 cm.

Strapless balconette bra in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Skater skirt in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and wide, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Metal earrings in various designs, three pairs of which are hoops with pendants. Sizes from 0.3-11.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a premium cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a soft textured cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed cap sleeves.
Short, off-the-shoulder, A-line dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top and half-length sleeves with smocking and a frill at the hems. Lined.
Sweatshirt in soft organic cotton with a  press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 12-18 months and 18-24 months without a press-stud). Brushed inside.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and at the crotch. One patterned and one in a solid colour.

Microfibre body that has a light shaping effect on the tummy and waist. Halterneck, mesh sections, a V-neck and mesh-lined triangular cups. Adjustable strap fastening at the back of the neck, and a lined gusset.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
Bag in braided paper straw with imitation leather handles and a zip at the top. Two small inner compartments. Lined. Size 12x34x49 cm.

Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a leg pocket with a taped zip and panels in a contrasting colour. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 5 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, buttons on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up hem with an appliqué.
Short dress in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
